div.span: Add section summaries & indexes in metadata
Pass 3 Similar Queries + User Query to Advanced Search
Perform Vector Search, Keyword Search, Re-Ranking
Select Top 10 Documents from Each Query
Combine and Increase Re-Ranking Scores for chunks of the same documents
Filter documents based on new Re-Ranking score
Step 5: Final Selection and Response Generation
Pass Selected Docs to GPT-4o for Answer
